targets.query: SELECT mean("queries") FROM "mysql" WHERE ("server" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_received"), 1s)*8 FROM "mysql" WHERE ("server" = '$server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s)*8 FROM "mysql" WHERE ("server" = '$server') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
